title: Detox | Pure Essential Oil Blend | Arogya Holistic Healing
description: Purify and cleanse with Arogya's premium Detox blend - a potent blend of eight essential oils to strengthen the body and clear the mind. Qualities: Detoxifying & Balancing.
cleaned_text: / Pure Essential Oil Blend (5mL) $30.00 Detox Essential Oil Blend Purify and cleanse with Arogya's signature Detox blend - a potent blend of eight essential oils to strengthen the body and clear the mind.* Ingredients: 100% Pure Essential Oils of Tea Tree, Lavender, Pine, Neroli, Rosemary, Peppermint, Thyme, and Palmarosa Qualities: Detoxifying, Balancing For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. If pregnant or nursing, consult your doctor before using. This essential oil blend is photosensitive - exposure to UV rays should be avoided for 24 hours after topical application.
